name: Twilight Cavern DEMO
description:
(I take no credit for the gifs and pngs.)

This game was made for the Treasure Jam!


You get your pick of brave adventurers, and when you choose your path,
you get to explore the legendary Twilight Caverns.

What treasure will you discover?


This game does have a tiny bit of development left to do, so bear with me!
